name: Katamari Soup
description:
You are a water sprite who just wants to make some awesome soup.  Run around the grocery store and collect ingredients, then hop into the soup pot before time runs out.  Each recipe requires some ingrdients, but everything else you gather will also impart some flavors to the final soup, for better or worse.

Katamari Soup was made during the 2019 Train Jam (Mar 14th .. Mar 17th), where the theme was circuitous (as was the journey).

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow keys: Move around
  • IJKL or Mouse movement: Control the camera
  • Space or Left Mouse Button: Jump

Jammers

  • Michael Noland
  • Kayla Techmeier
  • Patrick Marquardt
  • Joey Kozitza

Additional Help

  • Douglas Pennant (music) 
  • Bryan Cisneros (vfx)
  • Infinity Blade Pack from Epic Marketplace (vfx)
